description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，汉族，高级工程师。现任国家发展和改革委员会主任。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, of Han ethnicity, and a senior engineer. He is the current Director of the National Development and Reform Commission.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家发展和改革委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家发展和改革委员会
国家发展和改革委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的组成部门，是中国最高水平的经济管理部门。
description.en: A ministerial-level department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, it is the highest-level economic management agency.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国家发展和改革委员会主任，郑栅洁在厦门工作时的领导。
description.en: A Chinese politician, former Director of the National Development and Reform Commission, and Zheng Shanjie's superior during his time in Xiamen.

nodes.id: 中国共产党安徽省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党安徽省委员会
en: Anhui Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在安徽省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在郑栅洁担任安徽省委书记期间任副书记兼省长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Deputy Secretary and Governor of Anhui Province while Zheng Shanjie was the Provincial Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，郑栅洁的前任中共安徽省委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, Zheng Shanjie's predecessor as the Secretary of the Anhui Provincial Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，郑栅洁的继任中共安徽省委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, Zheng Shanjie's successor as the Secretary of the Anhui Provincial Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国浙江省的国家行政机关。
description.en: The state administrative organ of Zhejiang Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，郑栅洁的前任浙江省人民政府省长。在郑栅洁担任省长期间任浙江省委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, Zheng Shanjie's predecessor as Governor of the People's Government of Zhejiang Province. He served as Zhejiang Provincial Party Secretary while Zheng was Governor.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，郑栅洁的继任浙江省人民政府省长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, Zheng Shanjie's successor as Governor of the People's Government of Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 福建省下辖的地级市，是郑栅洁的出生地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Fujian Province, and the birthplace of Zheng Shanjie.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于江苏省南京市的一所高等院校，郑栅洁的母校之一。
description.en: An institution of higher education located in Nanjing, Jiangsu Province, and one of Zheng Shanjie's alma maters.

description.zh-cn: 位于福建省厦门市的一所综合性大学，郑栅洁的母校之一。
description.en: A comprehensive university located in Xiamen, Fujian Province, and one of Zheng Shanjie's alma maters.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会
en: 20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会选出的中央权力机构。
description.en: The central governing body elected by the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 指被认为与中国共产党中央委员会总书记习近平关系密切的官员群体。
description.en: Refers to a group of officials considered to be closely associated with Xi Jinping, the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁早期工作的企业，他曾在此担任厂长。
description.en: The factory where Zheng Shanjie worked in his early career, where he served as its director.

description.zh-cn: 由郑栅洁主导，以厦门鱼肝油厂为主体成立的科工贸一体化公司。
description.en: An integrated science, industry, and trade company established under the leadership of Zheng Shanjie with Xiamen Cod Liver Oil Factory as its main body.

nodes.id: 中国共产党宁波市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党宁波市委员会
en: Ningbo Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在宁波市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Ningbo.

nodes.id: 中国共产党厦门市湖里区委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党厦门市湖里区委员会
en: Huli District Committee of the Communist Party of China, Xiamen

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在厦门市湖里区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Huli District, Xiamen.

nodes.id: 厦门市湖里区人民政府

zh-cn: 厦门市湖里区人民政府
en: People's Government of Huli District, Xiamen

description.zh-cn: 中国福建省厦门市湖里区的国家行政机关。
description.en: The state administrative organ of Huli District, Xiamen, Fujian Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国福建省厦门市的国家行政机关。
description.en: The state administrative organ of Xiamen City, Fujian Province, China.

nodes.id: 厦门市发展计划委员会

zh-cn: 厦门市发展计划委员会

description.zh-cn: 厦门市发展和改革委员会的前身。
description.en: The predecessor of the Xiamen Development and Reform Commission.

nodes.id: 厦门市发展和改革委员会

zh-cn: 厦门市发展和改革委员会

description.zh-cn: 厦门市政府负责宏观经济调控的部门。
description.en: The department of the Xiamen municipal government responsible for macroeconomic regulation and control.

nodes.id: 福建省发展和改革委员会

zh-cn: 福建省发展和改革委员会
en: Fujian Provincial Development and Reform Commission

description.zh-cn: 福建省政府负责宏观经济调控的部门。
description.en: The department of the Fujian provincial government responsible for macroeconomic regulation and control.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国福建省的国家行政机关。
description.en: The state administrative organ of Fujian Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国负责能源行业管理的国家局，由国家发展和改革委员会管理。
description.en: A national bureau in the People's Republic of China responsible for the management of the energy industry, administered by the National Development and Reform Commission.

nodes.id: 中共中央台湾工作办公室

zh-cn: 中共中央台湾工作办公室
en: Taiwan Work Office of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主管台湾事务的议事协调机构。
description.en: The policy coordination body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for Taiwan affairs.

nodes.id: 国务院台湾事务办公室

zh-cn: 国务院台湾事务办公室
en: Taiwan Affairs Office of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管台湾事务的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative agency of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for Taiwan affairs.

nodes.id: 中国共产党浙江省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党浙江省委员会
en: Zhejiang Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在浙江省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Zhejiang Province.

nodes.id: 安徽省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 安徽省人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Anhui Provincial People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 安徽省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the Anhui Provincial People's Congress.

nodes.id: 第十四届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

zh-cn: 第十四届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
第十四届全国人民代表大会
en: First session of the 14th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 2023年3月在北京召开的全国性会议，会议期间任命了新一届国家机构领导人。
description.en: A national conference held in Beijing in March 2023, during which new leaders of state institutions were appointed.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，郑栅洁的前任福建省发展和改革委员会主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician, Zheng Shanjie's predecessor as Director of the Fujian Provincial Development and Reform Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，郑栅洁的继任福建省发展和改革委员会主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician, Zheng Shanjie's successor as Director of the Fujian Provincial Development and Reform Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，郑栅洁的前任中共浙江省委专职副书记和中共宁波市委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, Zheng Shanjie's predecessor as the full-time Deputy Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial CPC Committee and Secretary of the Ningbo Municipal CPC Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，郑栅洁的继任中共浙江省委专职副书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, Zheng Shanjie's successor as the full-time Deputy Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial CPC Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，郑栅洁的继任中共宁波市委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, Zheng Shanjie's successor as the Secretary of the Ningbo Municipal CPC Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国东南沿海的省份。
description.en: A province on the southeastern coast of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国家发展和改革委员会

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁现任中华人民共和国国家发展和改革委员会主任。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie currently serves as the Director of the National Development and Reform Commission of the People's Republic of China.

position.zh-cn: 国家发展和改革委员会主任
position.en: Director of the National Development and Reform Commission

description.zh-cn: 作为国家发改委主任，郑栅洁是国务院总理李强的下属。
description.en: As the Director of the National Development and Reform Commission, Zheng Shanjie is a subordinate of Premier Li Qiang.

relationships.target: 中国共产党安徽省委员会

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁曾任中国共产党安徽省委员会书记。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie previously served as the Secretary of the Anhui Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 在郑栅洁担任安徽省委书记期间，王清宪是其副手，担任副书记兼省长。
description.en: While Zheng Shanjie served as the Party Secretary of Anhui Province, Wang Qingxian was his deputy, serving as Deputy Secretary and Governor.

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁曾任浙江省人民政府省长。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie previously served as the Governor of the People's Government of Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁担任浙江省省长时，时任省委书记为袁家军。
description.en: When Zheng Shanjie was the Governor of Zhejiang Province, the Provincial Party Secretary was Yuan Jiajun.

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁出生于福建省漳州市。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie was born in Zhangzhou, Fujian Province.

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁于1985年6月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie joined the Communist Party of China in June 1985.

degree.zh-cn: 化工设备腐蚀与防护专业

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁于1982年毕业于南京化工学院（现南京工业大学）。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie graduated from Nanjing Institute of Chemical Technology (now Nanjing Tech University) in 1982.

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁获得厦门大学在职工商管理硕士学位。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie obtained an in-service Master of Business Administration degree from Xiamen University.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁是中国共产党第二十届中央委员会委员。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie is a member of the 20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁被外界广泛认为是习近平派系“闽江新军”成员之一。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie is widely considered by outsiders to be a member of the Xi Jinping faction, known as the 'Minjiang New Army'.

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁曾在企业工作15年，从机修工起步，后升任厦门鱼肝油厂副厂长，并于1991年1月升任厂长。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie worked in enterprises for 15 years, starting as a mechanic, later becoming Deputy Director of the Xiamen Cod Liver Oil Factory, and was promoted to Director in January 1991.

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁主导以厦门鱼肝油厂为主体，成立了厦门星鲨实业总公司。
description.en: Under the leadership of Zheng Shanjie, the Xiamen Xing-Sha Industrial Corporation was established with the Xiamen Cod Liver Oil Factory as its main body.

relationships.target: 中国共产党厦门市湖里区委员会

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁曾任中共厦门市湖里区委副书记。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie served as Deputy Secretary of the Huli District Committee of the CPC in Xiamen.

relationships.target: 厦门市湖里区人民政府

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁曾任厦门市湖里区代区长、区长。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie served as Acting District Mayor and District Mayor of Huli District, Xiamen.

position.en: Deputy Secretary-General, Director of the General Office

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁曾任厦门市人民政府副秘书长、办公厅主任。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie served as Deputy Secretary-General and Director of the General Office of the Xiamen Municipal People's Government.

relationships.target: 厦门市发展计划委员会

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁曾任厦门市发展计划委员会主任。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie served as Director of the Xiamen Development Planning Commission.

relationships.target: 厦门市发展和改革委员会

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁曾任厦门市发展和改革委员会主任。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie served as Director of the Xiamen Development and Reform Commission.

position.zh-cn: 厦门市发展和改革委员会主任
position.en: Director of Xiamen Development and Reform Commission

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁在厦门工作时，何立峰是其领导上司。2005年至2008年间，郑栅洁担任厦门市发改委主任，时任厦门市委书记为何立峰。
description.en: When Zheng Shanjie worked in Xiamen, He Lifeng was his superior. From 2005 to 2008, Zheng Shanjie served as the Director of the Xiamen Development and Reform Commission, while He Lifeng was the Party Secretary of Xiamen.

relationships.target: 福建省发展和改革委员会

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁历任福建省发改委副主任（2008年4月起）和主任（2010年5月起）。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie served successively as Deputy Director (from April 2008) and Director (from May 2010) of the Fujian Provincial Development and Reform Commission.

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁曾任福建省人民政府副省长。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie served as Vice Governor of the People's Government of Fujian Province.

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁曾任国家能源局副局长。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie served as Deputy Director of the National Energy Administration.

relationships.target: 中共中央台湾工作办公室

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁曾任中共中央台湾工作办公室副主任。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie served as Deputy Director of the Taiwan Work Office of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 国务院台湾事务办公室

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁曾任国务院台湾事务办公室副主任。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie served as Deputy Director of the Taiwan Affairs Office of the State Council.

relationships.target: 中国共产党浙江省委员会

position.en: Standing Committee Member, full-time Deputy Secretary

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁曾任中共浙江省委常委，并于2018年5月起任省委专职副书记。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie served as a Standing Committee Member of the Zhejiang Provincial CPC Committee, and from May 2018, as the full-time Deputy Secretary of the Provincial Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党宁波市委员会

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁曾任中共宁波市委书记。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie served as Secretary of the Ningbo Municipal CPC Committee.

relationships.target: 安徽省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁曾当选为安徽省人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie was elected as the Director of the Standing Committee of the Anhui Provincial People's Congress.

relationships.source: 第十四届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

description.zh-cn: 在第十四届全国人民代表大会第一次会议上，郑栅洁获提名出任国家发改委主任。
description.en: At the first session of the 14th National People's Congress, Zheng Shanjie was nominated to be the Director of the National Development and Reform Commission.

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁接替何立峰出任中华人民共和国国家发展和改革委员会主任。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie succeeded He Lifeng as the Director of the National Development and Reform Commission of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁接替李锦斌出任中国共产党安徽省委员会书记。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie succeeded Li Jinbin as the Secretary of the Anhui Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 韩俊接替郑栅洁出任中国共产党安徽省委员会书记。
description.en: Han Jun succeeded Zheng Shanjie as the Secretary of the Anhui Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁接替袁家军出任浙江省人民政府省长。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie succeeded Yuan Jiajun as the Governor of the People's Government of Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 王浩接替郑栅洁出任浙江省人民政府省长。
description.en: Wang Hao succeeded Zheng Shanjie as the Governor of the People's Government of Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁接替张志南出任福建省发展和改革委员会主任。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie succeeded Zhang Zhinan as the Director of the Fujian Provincial Development and Reform Commission.

description.zh-cn: 魏克良接替郑栅洁出任福建省发展和改革委员会主任。
description.en: Wei Keliang succeeded Zheng Shanjie as the Director of the Fujian Provincial Development and Reform Commission.

description.zh-cn: 郑栅洁接替唐一军出任中国共产党浙江省委员会专职副书记和中国共产党宁波市委员会书记。
description.en: Zheng Shanjie succeeded Tang Yijun as the full-time Deputy Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial CPC Committee and as the Secretary of the Ningbo Municipal CPC Committee.

description.zh-cn: 黄建发接替郑栅洁出任中国共产党浙江省委员会专职副书记。
description.en: Huang Jianfa succeeded Zheng Shanjie as the full-time Deputy Secretary of the Zhejiang Provincial CPC Committee.

description.zh-cn: 彭佳学接替郑栅洁出任中国共产党宁波市委员会书记。
description.en: Peng Jiaxue succeeded Zheng Shanjie as the Secretary of the Ningbo Municipal CPC Committee.
